com.azure.android.storage.blob.transfer

Class TransferClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.storage.blob.transfer.TransferClient

  • public class TransferClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A type that exposes blob transfer APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<TransferInfo> upload(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId,
                                                        java.lang.String containerName,
                                                        java.lang.String blobName,
                                                        java.io.File file)
        Upload the content of a file.
        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - The identifier of the blob storage client to use for the upload.
        containerName - The container to upload the file to.
        blobName - The name of the target blob holding uploaded file.
        file - The local file to upload.
        Returns:
        A LiveData that streams TransferInfo describing current state of the transfer.

      • upload

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<TransferInfo> upload(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId,
                                                        java.lang.String containerName,
                                                        java.lang.String blobName,
                                                        android.net.Uri contentUri)
        Upload content identified by a given Uri.
        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - The identifier of the blob storage client to use for the upload.
        containerName - The container to upload the file to.
        blobName - The name of the target blob holding uploaded file.
        contentUri - URI to the Content to upload, the contentUri is resolved using ContentResolver.openAssetFileDescriptor(Uri, String) with mode as "r". The supported URI schemes are: 'content://', 'file://' and 'android.resource://'.
        Returns:
        A LiveData that streams TransferInfo describing current state of the transfer.

      • download

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<TransferInfo> download(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId,
                                                          java.lang.String containerName,
                                                          java.lang.String blobName,
                                                          java.io.File file)
        Download a blob.
        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - the identifier of the blob storage client to use for the download
        containerName - The container to download the blob from.
        blobName - The name of the target blob to download.
        file - The local file to download to.
        Returns:
        A LiveData that streams TransferInfo describing the current state of the download.

      • download

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<TransferInfo> download(java.lang.String storageBlobClientId,
                                                          java.lang.String containerName,
                                                          java.lang.String blobName,
                                                          android.net.Uri contentUri)
        Download a blob.
        Parameters:
        storageBlobClientId - the identifier of the blob storage client to use for the download
        containerName - The container to download the blob from.
        blobName - The name of the target blob to download.
        contentUri - The URI to the local content where the downloaded blob will be stored.
        Returns:
        A LiveData that streams TransferInfo describing the current state of the download.

      • pause

        public void pause(long transferId)
        Pause a transfer identified by the given transfer id. The pause operation is a best-effort, and a transfer that is already executing may continue to transfer. Upon successful scheduling of the pause, any observer observing on the LiveData for this transfer receives a TransferInfo event with state TransferInfo.State.USER_PAUSED.
        Parameters:
        transferId - The transfer id identifies the transfer to pause.

      • resume

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<TransferInfo> resume(long transferId)
        Resume a paused transfer.
        Parameters:
        transferId - The transfer id identifies the transfer to resume.
        Returns:
        A LiveData that streams TransferInfo describing the current state of the transfer.

      • cancel

        public void cancel(long transferId)
        Cancel a transfer identified by the given transfer ID. The cancel operation is a best-effort, and a transfer that is already executing may continue to transfer. Upon successful scheduling of the cancellation, any observer observing on LiveData for this transfer receives a TransferInfo event with state TransferInfo.State.CANCELLED.
        Parameters:
        transferId - The transfer ID identifies the transfer to cancel.
